data.label: Lack of familiarity over in-house approaches

otherResponses: To authorize an API call we often rely on data that is too large to be loaded into OPA, e.g. data in a database. Maybe have missed it, or just havent looked hard enough, but we find it difficult to fetch data from a database in Rego.
OPA syntax too complicated. compare to other language i had to think more times
No support for custom authorization webhook
custom engine based on Groovy scripting
